item.title: Adventures with Public Collider Data
item.description: Diving into collider events recorded by the CMS detector at the LHC in a matter of minutes.

item.title: Training Collider Classifiers on Real Data
item.description: Overcoming a reliance on simulation to train classifiers directly on real collider data.
